page.title: 06OIL PLATFORMS
page.content:
{OIL RIGS With the discovery of oil in the North Sea there was a need for deep water sites for building concrete platforms.Toward with it's Loch Striven suited the purpose well. The platforms were started in 1974 and finished in 1975 because concrete platforms went of fashion. In this period of time they built only two platforms which were towed to the North Sea on completion. Sadly this was the end of Toward's connection with the oil "boom".
{By Iain Mcfarlane { & { Peter Brewer { __________________________
